query.description: Natural-language search question or topic to investigate.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve before summarization.

preferred_domains.description: Domains to prioritize in ranking, e.g. reuters.com.

blocked_domains.description: Domains to avoid due to trust or relevance constraints.

language.description: Preferred language code for search results.

include_snippets.description: Whether to include source snippets in the final output.
